Class UI

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI

  • public class UI
extends java.lang.Object
    UI Class handles all interactions with the Screen and the Player using static classes. This Class clears the console screen, prints graphics for Cards and handles user's inputs.
    Author:
    Giorgos Christidis, Giorgos Giannios

      • congrats

        Parameters:

      • checkCharStoreInt

        private static void checkCharStoreInt(int cardNo)
        Checks if coordinates of a card are not chars. Takes the Card number and scans the coordinates.
        Parameters:
        cardNo - The Card number to scan for.
